Define Documentation

#define FATALCALL ( cond,
complaint   ) 

Value:

if (cond) {           \
        perror(complaint);  \
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
      }

#define FATALTEST ( cond,
complaint   ) 

Value:

if (cond) {           \
        fprintf(stderr, complaint);  \
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
      }

#define FATALTEST2 ( cond,
complaint,
p1   ) 

Value:

if (cond) {           \
        fprintf(stderr, complaint, p1);  \
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
      }

#define FATALTEST3 ( cond,
complaint,
p1,
p2   ) 

Value:

if (cond) {           \
        fprintf(stderr, complaint, p1, p2);  \
        exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
      }

int getval ( char *  p  ) 

Convert the val size.

This does not check for overflow. Aborts on non-digit characters.

Parameters:
p a pointer to a decimal-only string.
Returns:
the numeric value of the string.
